TAUNT.szText: Oh, Foxy. I didn't even have a time to read you my poem....
Serves you right, you slut!
What can I say, I'm a better draw.
I'm gonna miss your cinematography...
Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.
Go to hell, Hellar!
That door revolved one time too many...
Rot in hell, you backstabbing bastard.
Take a hike, Mike! Damn, that sounded better in my head...
I'll give you my autograph, Gillitt... in your condolence book!
I knew I was better than you, Gillitt!
I just whacked Miguel Cordona! Finally, Queen will hear about me!
Wanna see a magic trick? Bam, he's gone!
Oh no, he's going down! Prepare for the shockwave!
You are a sad, strange, little man, and you have my pity!
Hey, Cordona! Queen Dee Dee says hi!
I'll get promotion for killing you, rebel scum!
Bang-bang! Just like in 'Attack of the Clydesdales'!
Much Dust, Many Bullets!
Get back on your Honda, and travel away!
Forgive me, for I have sinned!
Get back to your grave, you freakin' zombie!
Please, tell us the story about Gettysburg battle again!
Now that's an easy target!
Nice ears, Jumbo! They'll look fine on my necklace!
Where's your God now?!
Father, what about the fifth commandment? You damn hypocrite!
Who's that psycho chick?
Aren't you a bit old for this, geezer?
All the fat didn't protect internal organs?
No, not you Lynx! I wanted to hang your head over the chimney!
This one's delusional - he thinks he's a killer whale!
How appropriate, you fight like a big fat cow!
Stop shaking! I can't hit you!
Stop moving! I can't aim when the ground is shaking!
Holy shit, it's Gus Tarballs! We're fucked!
TAUNT.szTextCensored: Holy shit, it's Gus Tarballs! We're screwed!

TAUNT.szText: Hey, it's a guy from 'Wild, Wild East'! I'm your biggest fan!
Enemy detected! Damn, he's hard to miss...
Howdy, pardner!
You remind me of my Chinese friend... Ug Lee!
Well, if it ain't my favourite celebrity! I have all the posters with you back in the barracks...
You know, I could slap you right now, but I don't want a slut on my hand!
Nice guns you've got there! Are they real, or just replicas?
Guys, don't shoot the cushions!
Hey guys, I think this one's pregnant!
Quickly, someone call Captain Ahab!
Are you lost? The auditions for 'Free Willy' are that way!
Please, don't eat me!
Hey honey, what are you doing here? You couldn't handle the washing machine?
Look guys, I've found fossils!
Look guys, I've found fossils!
Look guys, I've found fossils!
Look guys, dinosaurs are still alive!
Look guys, dinosaurs are still alive!
Look guys, dinosaurs are still alive!
Wow, you've got nice... personality.
You remind me of a younger, dumber Schwarzenegger!
Hey, asshole! Eighties called, say they want their haircut back!
